scripts.deploy:rinkeby: graph deploy --network rinkeby --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ radicle-dev/radicle-orgs-rinkeby subgraph.rinkeby.yaml
scripts.deploy:ropsten: graph deploy --network ropsten --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ radicle-dev/radicle-orgs-ropsten subgraph.ropsten.yaml
scripts.deploy:mainnet: graph deploy --network mainnet --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ radicle-dev/radicle-orgs subgraph.mainnet.yaml
